document_data.name: Purify Food and Drink
document_data.mainbody: '''''Purify food and drink''''' was a [[transmutation]] or [[alteration]] spell that make food edible and water potable. The alteration version could be reversed, creating '''''putrefy food and drink''''', which spoiled food and fouled water.
document_data.Effects:
The transmutation version of this spell as an [[orison]] learned by beginning [[cleric]]s and [[druid]]s of any faith.For comparison: water weighs about {{SI|8.3|lb|k}} per {{SI|1|gallon|l}} or 1 kg per liter. One cubic foot of water contains roughly {{SI|7.5|gal|l|}} and weighs about {{SI|62|lb|k}}. The spell removed dirt, poisons, parasites, mold, fungus, and impurities of any kind, making it suitable for consumption by most humanoids. Unholy water was ruined by this spell.

When cast in reverse, ''putrefy food and drink'' rotted food and contaminated beverages in like amounts, making them unfit and possibly dangerous to consume. Holy water was ruined by this spell.
document_data.Components: All versions of this spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
